2022-23 (Junior)

Competed at the 2022 Michigan State Open in the Open Division

Won the 157-pound Open Division at the 2022 Bob Del Rosa Open with a 4-0 record

Isaac Wilcox

Academic All-Big Ten

Posted a 2-2 record in duals an was 0-1 in extra matches

Ended the season with a 12-5 record wrestling unattached in open events

Wrestled in the U23 Freestyle World Team Trials at 74kg … finished with 0-2 record (June 3-5, Geneva, Ohio)

2020-21 (Freshman)

• Competed in four matches, going 2-2 on the year.

PRIOR TO OHIO STATE

• Three-time Utah high school state champion

• Placed third as a freshman

• Compiled an overall high school record of 176-12 including a 84-3 mark as an upperclassman

• USA Wrestling Folkstyle 152 lbs champion (2019)

• Reno Tournament of Champions title winner

• Finalist in the Doc Buchanan event and High School National Championships

• Finished fifth at the High School National Championships as a sophomore

• Junior and Cadet Freestyle All-American

• First Team All-Utah linebacker after leading his squad in tackles
